movies.title: Frozen II
movies.synopsis: Elsa, Anna, Kristoff, and Olaf head far into the forest to learn the truth about an ancient mystery of their kingdom.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins.

movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets gets a chance to have his past erased.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.synopsis: Simba, a lion cub, flees his kingdom only to return and reclaim it as king

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.synopsis: A theme park featuring cloned dinosaurs turns into chaos when things go wrong.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.synopsis: A romance blossoms aboard the ill-fated Titanic between Jack and Rose.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help to restore his secret identity, leading to multiverse chaos.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A marine on an alien planet gets caught between duty and protecting a new world.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movies.synopsis: Three decades after the Galactic Civil War, a new threat arises, and a scavenger named Rey is drawn into the conflict.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.synopsis: T'Challa, heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a gangster's wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The story of a man with a low IQ who accomplished great things in his life, despite his limitations.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.synopsis: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

tvShows.title: Stranger Things
tvShows.synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces to get him back.

tvShows.title: Breaking Bad
tvShows.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher turns to making and selling meth after being diagnosed with cancer.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones
tvShows.synopsis: Noble families vie for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros while an ancient threat emerges.

tvShows.title: The Office
tvShows.synopsis: A mockumentary on the everyday lives of office employees at Dunder Mifflin.

tvShows.title: Friends
tvShows.synopsis: Follows the lives of six friends navigating relationships and careers in New York City.

tvShows.title: Sherlock
tvShows.synopsis: A modern adaptation of Sherlock Holmes solving crimes in contemporary London.

tvShows.title: The Mandalorian
tvShows.synopsis: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy protects a mysterious child.

tvShows.title: The Witcher
tvShows.synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, navigates a world full of magic and political intrigue.

tvShows.title: Better Call Saul
tvShows.synopsis: The story of con-man turned lawyer Jimmy McGill before he became Saul Goodman.

tvShows.title: Loki
tvShows.synopsis: Loki, the God of Mischief, finds himself in a new timeline and tangled in the TVA's affairs.

tvShows.title: The Crown
tvShows.synopsis: A historical drama about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

tvShows.title: Westworld
tvShows.synopsis: A futuristic theme park allows visitors to live out their fantasies, but the androids begin to malfunction.

tvShows.title: Narcos
tvShows.synopsis: The story of the rise and fall of the Medellín drug cartel and the DEA agents who fought to bring it down.

tvShows.title: The Big Bang Theory
tvShows.synopsis: A group of socially awkward scientists navigate life, love, and friendships in Pasadena.

tvShows.title: Parks and Recreation
tvShows.synopsis: The absurd antics of public officials in the Parks and Recreation Department of Pawnee, Indiana.

tvShows.title: The Simpsons
tvShows.synopsis: The satirical adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

tvShows.title: The Walking Dead
tvShows.synopsis: A group of survivors must navigate a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies.

tvShows.title: House of Cards
tvShows.synopsis: A ruthless politician and his ambitious wife stop at nothing to achieve power in Washington, D.C.
